## dict-utils package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [filterDict(input, filter)](./dict-utils.filterdict.md) | Filter a dictionary, using a predicate to be applied to each value |
|  [filterDict(input, filter)](./dict-utils.filterdict_1.md) | Filter a dictionary, using a predicate to be applied to each value |
|  [forEachDict(input, callback)](./dict-utils.foreachdict.md) | Iterate over a dictionary, invoking a callback for each non-undefined value |
|  [mapDict(input, transform)](./dict-utils.mapdict.md) | Transform a dictionary by applying a value transformation function to each value |
|  [reduceDict(input, reducer, initialValue)](./dict-utils.reducedict.md) | Incrementally arrive at a singular value from a <code>Dict&lt;T&gt;</code> using a reducer function |
